mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rsvt( rsvt_no, biz_no, user_id, rsvt_ymd, rsvt_tm, rsvt_nope, rsvt_want, rsvt_pay, rsvt_tm, rsvt_stts, com_order_yn, pay_mthhd, alarm_yn) VALUES( #{rsvtNo}, #{bizNo}, #{userId}, #{rsvtYmd}, #{rsvtTm}, #{rsvtNope}, #{rsvtWant}, #{rsvtPay}, #{payTm}, #{rsvtStts}, #{comOrderYn}, #{payMthhd}, #{alarmYn} )
